name: B-BALL INFERNO
description:
Entry for the January 2023 KO!! Slam Jam game jam

You were cast down to purgatory for basketball crimes. For long years you have trained, and today is the day you break out of this dump. Fight through hordes of fiends and absorb their souls to enhance your abilities. Then, when you have grown powerful, face the gatekeeper and rejoin the outside world once more.

PSA:

There is a rare crash that sometimes occurs when changing scenes (e.g. main area to boss area). Unfortunately due to time constraints and the elusiveness of the bug in question, it currently remains unfixed. You should still be able to play the main game loop uninterrupted, but I apologize for any crashes you may experience nonetheless. Avoid dashing into the boss room gate, walk in instead.
